abstract: Officials say Afghanistan’s plan to gain leverage over Pakistan by cultivating an alliance with the Pakistan Taliban was discovered by the United States, which disrupted attempt by raiding a convoy carrying a senior militant; incident, which has become latest rift in troubled relationship between the two nations, exposes new level of futility in war effort.
lead_paragraph: Afghanistan’s attempt to gain leverage over Pakistan by cultivating an alliance with the Pakistan Taliban was discovered by the United States, which raided a convoy carrying a senior militant in the latest flash point between the nations.

headline.main: U.S. Disrupts Afghans’ Tack on Militants
headline.print_headline: U.S. Disrupts Afghans’ Tack On Militants

snippet: Afghanistan’s attempt to gain leverage over Pakistan by cultivating an alliance with the Pakistan Taliban was discovered by the United States, which raided a convoy carrying a senior militant in the latest flash point between the nations....
